testcase.name: Adding book to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Non-fiction page.......................................passed And User adds the first Non-fiction book to the cart........................passed When User closes the cart popup.............................................passed Then the cart counter should be greater than 0..............................passed

testcase.name: User can clear cart and see empty cart message
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Non-fiction page.......................................passed And User adds the first Non-fiction book to the cart........................passed When User clears the cart from the popup....................................passed Then User should see an empty cart message..................................passed

testcase.name: Cart count equals 0 after clearing cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Non-fiction page.......................................passed And User adds the first Non-fiction book to the cart........................passed When User clears the cart from the popup....................................passed And User closes the cart popup..............................................passed Then the cart counter should be 0...........................................passed
